        #include <bits/stdc++.h>

            for (ll& x : v) cin >> x;
            ll ans = 1e18;
            for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
                ll prev = 0;
                ll cost = 0;
                for (int j = i+1; j < n; j++) {
                    ll k = prev/v[j] + 1;
                    cost += k;
                    prev = k*v[j];
                }
                prev = 0;
                for (int j = i-1; j >= 0; j--) {
                    ll k = prev/v[j] + 1;
                    cost += k;
                    prev = k*v[j];
                }
                ans = min(ans, cost);
            }
            cout << ans << '\n';
        }
